website_summaries.verdict: A versatile home reformer with plenty of bells and whistles to duplicate your full Pilates workout from the gym.
pros: This improved model has a wider stationary bar and base
Comes bundled with stand, rebounder, head and neck pillow, DVDs, and chart
cons: Very noisy when using rebounder, especially for tall users

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: We got this on an Amazon Deal of the day for a great price. But for $500, it still would be well worth it. Both my husband and I use this several times a week. A little small for him, at 6’2” but workable. Fits me just right at 5’7”. As a manual therapist, I recommend reformer Pilates to patients regularly for chronic back issues, and this works great for us. If we were going to classes, we would have spent that much in a month for both of us. It does everything we need.
customer_reviews.author: JLu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this reformer. Quality made product. Took about an hour to assemble. I wanted to be able to slide it to other side of room if needed, so I took another reviewer's recommendation to put sliders under the feet. It worked too well and every time my foot hit the rebounder, the reformer slid on the floor so I removed them. I really enjoy this reformer.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda May Applebee

customer_reviews.title: Epic epic
customer_reviews.text: A marvelous way to have fun and exercise.. A great price. Kid friendly. It sits in our living room... use it daily for strength- stamina and recovery and stretching...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality and poor finishing
customer_reviews.text: This machine has a low quality rails and does not allow you to adjust or make it leveled on carpet surfaces. The exercise cart has a bump when moving forward and back. Poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn De Marco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect machine for home use
customer_reviews.text: Amazing machine for home use! This reformed and the dvd that comes with it is a really good workout. Good for toning, stretching and strength building.
customer_reviews.author: tricia

customer_reviews.title: Reformer great; straps are a real problem
customer_reviews.text: The reformer is great but the straps are the worst. They never stay in place and are constantly slipping and need adjusting during the workout. They could have found a better way to secure them so they don’t need constant readjusting. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: Carri Karuhn

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. I prefer our treadmill and rower.
customer_reviews.author: ronny111

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions were well written. Setup was easier than expected and probably took less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: CAYellowJacket

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The only problem is that it doesn’t bring half of spring. The rest I love it
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Brcek

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine and customer services is really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Pampered Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pilates on your own schedule!
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I expected based on my previous Pilates experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for Basic Pillattes.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Work great for basics. Gliding is bit cranky.
customer_reviews.author: Suchita P.

customer_reviews.title: Size of machine
customer_reviews.text: This reformer is narrower than the studios’. It’s perfect for my 5’1”, petite frame.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Full body workout at home.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this pilates machine for 45 minutes and using my max trainer for 15 minutes every other day. It’s a great work out. I also bought the red bands for extra resistance. This is better than going to gym because I can watch movies on prime while working out, and I don’t have to wait in line to use a strength training machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lorenzana

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I put together myself. Came well packaged and fairly easy to assemble. Works well. No noisecore rattling at all. Firm & stable. I was worried it would be light & wouldn’t slide smoothly but it’s really great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cass

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 5 years. It still works great. It’s perfect for pilates basics. Love that I can slide it into a closet when necessary. Only complaint is I had a bit of trouble getting the straps even.
customer_reviews.author: CAsoccermom

customer_reviews.title: Shop around
customer_reviews.text: There’s better quality machines out there that will last longer at the same price range. Parts used on this one seem To be low quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ace

customer_reviews.title: Great low impact full-body workout.
customer_reviews.text: This reformer has been part of my workout for the last 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Neumeister

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: The machine is not a bad machine, but I had a cracked part that the seller never replace or communicated with me. This was cracked when I opened the box. Zero for communication and 3 on the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Dzona

product_meta.title: AeroPilates Premier Reformer
product_meta.description: Luxurious for Lean Muscle Building:The AeroPilates Premier reformer has all the benefits of a top-of-the-line reformer and includes all the luxuries that everyone has asked for at an affordable price. Foremost, the Pilates reformer rests on a stand, making it easier to get on and off the machine. It includes a 2-inch taller cardio rebounder, a larger, trapezoidal platform to provide more room for your torso and a wider foot bar for better range of motion for hips and legs. The head and neck support pillow is also included to nurture your neck and support your head as a natural extension of your spine while jumping or performing exercises.High Performance, Low Impact With 4 black resistance cords, you will be able to achieve the correct level of resistance to make your workout as intense as you can endure. Most unique to AeroPilates, the Freeform Cardio rebounder will help you reach and maintain your desired weight, flatten your stomach, strengthen your pelvic floor and target your goal heart rate as effectively as with a treadmill but without any of the impact or stress. Even more, the risers at the head of the machine allow you to adjust the angle of the straps to make the exercises more challenging.
feature_bullets: All the benefits of a studio Pilates workout at home--improve your strength and flexibility, tone and sculpt your physique
Low impact Free-Form Cardio Rebounder is gentle on your joints, comes with DVD video workouts and exercise wall chart
Included stand elevates reformer by 10 inches to allow for more advanced exercises
Some assembly required; 3-year warranty on frame, 90 days on parts
Dimensions assembled: 86.25 L x 20 W x 14 H inches
